      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String client,
       java.util.Date aDate,
       java.lang.String aMessage)
        "To all" Message Constructor
        Parameters:
        client - the user name of the client who create the message
        aDate - the message creation date
        aMessage - the message text

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String client,
       java.util.Date aDate,
       java.lang.String aMessage,
       java.lang.String to)
        Constructor of a Message sent to a particular receiver
        Parameters:
        client - the user name of the client which sent the message
        aDate - the date of creation of the message
        aMessage - the text of the message
        to - the receiver (useful for the Socket Chat Program)
